TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LosFormatter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Serializes the view state for a Web Forms page. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The limited object serialization (LOS) formatter is designed for highly compact ASCII format serialization. This class supports serializing any object graph, but is optimized for those containing strings, arrays, and hash tables. It offers second order optimization for many of the .NET Framework primitive types.
This is a private format and remains consistent only for the lifetime of a Web request.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Transforms the specified view-state value to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

Docs.param: A that contains the view-state value to transform.
Docs.summary: Transforms the view-state value contained in a object to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method is used to transform the view-state value contained in a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to a LOS-formatted object.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

Docs.summary: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value.

Docs.summary: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value and places the results into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter.Serialize%2A> method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. The results are then placed into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter.Serialize%2A> method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. The results are then placed into a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
